abstract: James R Oestreich Critic's Notebook on the reopening of the Bolshoi Theater in Moscow, with a program seen in a live HD broadcast in a cinema on Manhattan's Upper East Side.
snippet: The Bolshoi Theater celebrated its reopening in Moscow after a huge renovation, with a program seen in an HD broadcast at a theater on the Upper East Side of Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: The Bolshoi Theater celebrated its reopening in Moscow after a huge renovation, with a program seen in an HD broadcast at a theater on the Upper East Side of Manhattan.

headline.main: Live From Moscow: It’s Friday Night at the Bolshoi, Friday Morning in New York
headline.print_headline: Live From Moscow: It’s Friday Night at the Bolshoi, Friday Morning in New York
headline.seo: Bolshoi Theater Gala on Live HD Broadcast
